item.description:
Here's our first Young Eagles rally. We'll need pilots with planes to fly the youngsters around. You MUST be a current EAA member to fly. www.EAA.org is the site to join.

We'll need a good ground crew as well.
June 14th is International Young Eagles Day. Over a 1,379,615 Young Eagles have flown as of this writing. You can learn more at Young Eagles web site

We'll try to get newspapers and radio there. We've been talking about this for a long time.
We can work out the details at our next couple meetings.

If you are involved with Boy Scouts, Girl Scouts, schools or any other organization that has kids between 8 and 17 years old, please invite them. We'll work out logistics later!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the Terminal and go from there!
item.why: We'll need plenty of help. Contact Ed Murphy, Louise Anderson or Jim Bisson for more info.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Assoc/Young Eagles Rally #1
